title: Java Developer
description:
Who we are

Leading in Germany and all over Europe, Laudert is a creative, strategic as well as operative partner in all matters of product communication for many renowned customers. Laudert is building a team for the priint Group. 

Founded in Germany, priint Group is the global leader in solutions that bring Product Data to life. Driven by the strong belief that timely and relevant marketing materials, digital and printed, are key to deliver an engaging customer experience, priint Group enables organizations to create their marketing publications up to 80% more efficiently through its priint:suite platform, cloud services and integration into virtually any data system. priint Group brings digital transformation and automation to the creative lifecycle. 

We are now looking for two Senior Full Stack Java Developers with in-depth knowledge of Java programming for priint Group’s project. We want you to learn all about our software suite and help build the software that our customers use daily. Our tasks are diverse, and you’ll be able to choose from a wide range of projects from backend webservices to data integration and even full stack roles. You’ll be able to express yourself by taking charge as a domain expert and you are expected to bring in your own ideas to improve the processes and make our products even better. 

We are providing an exciting environment and do everything to ensure your professional development. Join our team now!

What awaits you

  • A professional working atmosphere in a committed and successful team
  • Diverse and interesting projects with a high level of personal responsibility and independence
  • Flat hierarchies, appreciation and respect as well as a feel-good environment

What you will do

  • Develop components and modules for a cloud-based solution in a Docker/Kubernetes environment
  • Direct collaboration with our teams in Germany and Vietnam
  • Design and implement powerful solutions
  • Based on business requirements, pursue, present and realize innovative approaches
  • Develop high-level product specifications taking into account system integration and feasibility
  • Ensure that the software meets all quality, security, flexibility and extensibility requirements
responsibilities:
• Do the Coding and debugging tasks.
  • Self-testing by test tool to ensure the code quality.
  • Able to independently write a design specification that meets the requirements (for senior DEV level)
  • To perform other tasks assigned by the Line Manager, Project Manager & Technical Manager
requiredSkills:
• Strong analytical, design, programming, and deployment skills for applications and software services.
  • Proactive in learning and implementing new technologies.
  • Open to changes or completely redoing projects when required.
  • Teamwork skills and ability to read and understand English technical documents.
keySkills: Java, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, SQL
qualification: • Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (IT) or related fields.
benefit:
• Full salary during the probation period.
  • 13th-month salary + performance bonus + holiday bonuses.
  • Comprehensive welfare package: Social insurance, OPES Care health insurance for employees and their families, lunch, transportation, and phone allowances.
  • Preferential loan support for OPESers from VPBank (home loans/consumer loans).
  • Personal development guidance and support through annual IDP programs.
  • Balanced work schedule focused on efficiency: 5 working days/week (off on Saturdays and Sundays). Annual leave from 14 to 21 days (based on seniority).
  • A youthful, dynamic working environment with corporate cultural activities, team building, and travel events.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze data and generate business insights.
responsibilities: Collect data, perform analysis, create reports, support decision making.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field

title: Project Manager
description: Manage and oversee project development from start to finish.
responsibilities: Plan project, assign tasks, monitor progress, ensure timely delivery.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

title: Marketing Specialist
responsibilities: Conduct market research, develop campaigns, manage social media.
requiredSkills: SEO, SEM, Social Media Marketing, Content creation
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field

title: HR Manager
requiredSkills: Recruitment, Employee relations, HR software, Labor law
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related field

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and improve user experience.
responsibilities: Create wireframes, design prototypes, conduct user research.
requiredSkills: Figma, Adobe XD, User Research, Prototyping
keySkills: Creativity, User-centric design, Attention to detail
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field

title: Network Engineer
responsibilities: Install network hardware, configure routers, monitor network performance.
keySkills: Problem-solving, Attention to detail, Technical skills
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business processes and identify improvements.
responsibilities: Gather requirements, document processes, support project implementation.
requiredSkills: SQL, Business Analysis, Project Management, Visio
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement and manage continuous delivery systems.
responsibilities: Automate deployments, manage infrastructure, monitor systems.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Customer Support Specialist
description: Provide customer support and resolve issues.
responsibilities: Respond to customer inquiries, resolve technical issues, provide product support.
requiredSkills: Customer Service, CRM, Technical Support, Communication

title: Content Writer
description: Create engaging content for various platforms.
responsibilities: Write articles, create social media posts, develop content strategies.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, or related field

title: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial data and provide insights.
responsibilities: Perform financial analysis, create reports, support decision making.
requiredSkills: Excel, Financial Modeling, Data Analysis, Accounting
keySkills: Analytical thinking, Attention to detail, Financial acumen
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field

title: Sales Executive
description: Drive sales and develop customer relationships.
responsibilities: Identify sales opportunities, build client relationships, meet sales targets.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Ensure the quality of software products.
responsibilities: Write test cases, perform testing, report bugs, collaborate with developers.
keySkills: Attention to detail, Analytical thinking, Problem-solving
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: HR Assistant
description: Assist in HR functions and processes.
responsibilities: Support recruitment, manage employee records, assist with HR policies.
requiredSkills: HR Software, Recruitment, Employee Relations, Administration
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related field
